entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and overnight. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 18 February 2023
